article: the outgoing republican chairman of the senate foreign relations committee expressed doubt about the wisdom of increasing troops in iraq and urged president george w. bush to consult with lawmakers before changing his war strategy .
abstract: outgoing republican chairman calls for u.s. president to consult congress on iraq
